flawed_nl_solution:
Dave weighs 175 pounds and can bench press 3 times his body weight, so he can bench press 175*3 = <<175*3=255>>255 pounds
Craig can only bench press 20% of Dave's 255 pounds, so Craig can bench press 0.2*255 = <<20*0.01*255=51>>51 pounds
Craig bench presses 51 pounds and Mark does 50 pounds less than Craig, so Mark can only press 51-50 = <<51-50=1>>1 pounds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 525, not 255. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
